text:
There is a typo in the example in the Using Active Directory section of the mod_authnz_ldap documentation.  The line

AuthLDAPURL ldap://10.0.0.1:3268/>userPrincipalName?sub

should appear as

AuthLDAPURL ldap://10.0.0.1:3268/?userPrincipalName?sub

(or at least it works for me that way and not the other).
creator: jamie.taylor@pobox.com
